title: Three Bed Apartment for Sale at Heavenly Homes
location: Seagull Heavenly Homes, 40, De Kretser Place, Colombo 4
details:
Furnished three bedroom apartment for sale at Seagull Heavenly Homes, Bambalapitiya. Conveniently located on De Kretser Place, only 50m from R. A. De Mel Mawatha & 300m from Galle Road. The apartment offers generous living space along with a total of three bedrooms and two bathrooms.

The apartment features a spacious living and dining area along with a fully fitted pantry. The master bedroom is well designed with plenty of closet space and a spacious master bathroom. The apartment benefits from a wide range of shared facilities and amenities which include a swimming pool, gym, function room, roof top terrace, children's play area, secure covered parking garage and 24 hour security.

- Three bedrooms equipped with A/C.
- Two bathrooms equipped with electric hot water.
- Spacious living and dining area equipped with A/C.
- Pantry with fitted cupboards.
- Appliances include; TV, oven, cooker, fridge, washing machine.
- Maids room & bathroom.
- Separate utility/laundry area.
- Covered parking reserved for one vehicle.

Price negotiable upon inspection.

Viewings can be arranged by prior appointment only.
